818040.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi -「信長の野望の日」記念コンテンツ（2018）/Memorial Contents 2018
818040.description:
Additional BGM that can be used in "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Taishi"

10 pieces of BGM available for free.
Allows BGM such as Fragrant Wind (Sengoku Daimyo theme), The Indefatigable (Yukimura Sanada's theme), and Beautiful Expedition (The Siege of Osaka theme) to be used in this title.
By changing the BGM, you enjoy gameplay with a different atmosphere.

▼How to use
To change the BGM, from "Settings", select "Change BGM", and then press the Change button.
